scripts.migrate:seed: npx prisma migrate dev && ts-node script.ts
scripts.reset:seed: npx prisma migrate reset && ts-node script.ts
scripts.dev: npm run kill:nexus && npm run kill:tgql && concurrently "npm run nexus" "npm run tgql"
scripts.kill:all: npm run kill:nexus && npm run kill:tgql
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:nexus" "npm run dev:tgql" "npm run gen:wunder" "npm run dev:wunder" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:deps: npm install && cd nexus && npm install && cd .. && cd GQL && npm install && cd .. && cd wunder && npm install && cd .. && cd frontend && npm install && cd ..
